text: E so pe: “A gbagbo ninu Allahu ati ohun ti Won sokale fun wa ati ohun ti Won sokale fun (awon Anabi) ’Ibrohim, ’Ismo‘il, ’Ishaƙ, Ya‘ƙub ati awon aromodomo Ya‘ƙub. (A gbagbo ninu) ohun ti Won fun (awon Anabi) Musa ati ‘Isa, ati ohun ti Won fun awon Anabi (yooku) lati odo Oluwa won. A ko ya eni kan soto ninu won. Awa si ni musulumi (olujuwo-juse sile) fun Un.”
